chartSettings.plainMarkdownContent:
The Wavefront Collector for Kubernetes can auto-discover pods and services that expose metrics, and dynamically start collecting metrics for the targets.
[Learn More](https://github.com/wavefrontHQ/wavefront-collector-for-kubernetes/blob/main/docs/discovery.md)

Ingress NGINX have to be deployed with `metrics.enabled`

```sh
helm upgrade ingress-nginx ingress-nginx --repo https://kubernetes.github.io/ingress-nginx \
--namespace ingress-nginx --set controller.metrics.enabled=true \
--set-string controller.podAnnotations."prometheus\.io/scrape"="true" \
--set-string controller.podAnnotations."prometheus\.io/port"="10254"
```

sources.name: A
sources.query: sum(msum(2m, rate(ts(nginx.ingress.controller.requests.counter, cluster=${cluster_name} AND controller_pod="${controller}" AND controller_class="${controller_class}" AND namespace="${namespace}"))))

sources.name: A
sources.query: sum(msum(2m, rate(ts(nginx.ingress.controller.requests.counter, cluster=${cluster_name} AND controller_pod="${controller}" AND controller_class="${controller_class}" AND namespace="${namespace}"))))

sources.name: A
sources.query: sum(msum(2m, ts("nginx.ingress.controller.nginx.process.connections.gauge", cluster=${cluster_name} AND controller_pod="${controller}" AND controller_class="${controller_class}" AND namespace="${namespace}" AND state=active)))

sources.name: A Clone 2
sources.query: ts("nginx.ingress.controller.nginx.process.connections.gauge", cluster=${cluster_name} AND controller_pod="${controller}" AND controller_class="${controller_class}" AND namespace="${namespace}" AND state=active)

sources.name: Error Rate
sources.query: sum(msum(2m, rate(ts("nginx.ingress.controller.requests.counter", cluster=${cluster_name} AND controller_pod="${controller}" AND controller_class="${controller_class}" AND namespace="${namespace}" AND status=/[4-5]../))))

sources.name: Total Rate
sources.query: sum(msum(2m, rate(ts("nginx.ingress.controller.requests.counter", cluster=${cluster_name} AND controller_pod="${controller}" AND controller_class="${controller_class}" AND namespace="${namespace}"))))

sources.name: Success Rate
sources.query: (${Error Rate}/${Total Rate})*100

sources.name: A
sources.query: sum(msum(2m, rate(ts(nginx.ingress.controller.requests.counter, cluster=${cluster_name} AND controller_pod="${controller}" AND controller_class="${controller_class}" AND namespace="${namespace}"))))

sources.name: A
sources.query: msum(2m, rate(ts(nginx.ingress.controller.success.counter, controller_pod="${controller}" AND controller_class="${controller_class}" AND namespace="${namespace}")))

sources.name: A
sources.query: timestamp(if( ts(nginx.ingress.controller.config.last.reload.successful.gauge, cluster=${cluster_name} AND controller_pod="${controller}" AND controller_class="${controller_class}" AND namespace="${namespace}") < 1, 1))

sources.name: B
sources.query: at(1m,time())

sources.name: A
sources.query: sum(msum(2m, rate(ts(nginx.ingress.controller.requests.counter, cluster=${cluster_name} AND controller_pod="${controller}" AND controller_class="${controller_class}" AND namespace="${namespace}"))))

sources.name: A
sources.query: ts(nginx.ingress.controller.ssl.expire.time.seconds.gauge, cluster=${cluster_name} AND pod="${controller}" AND class="${controller_class}" AND namespace="${namespace}")

sources.name: B
sources.query: at(1m,time())

sources.name: A
sources.query: sum(msum(2m, rate(ts("nginx.ingress.controller.requests.counter", cluster=${cluster_name} AND controller_pod="${controller}" AND controller_class="${controller_class}" AND namespace="${namespace}" AND ingress=${ingress}))), ingress)

sources.name: Error Rate
sources.query: sum(msum(2m, rate(ts("nginx.ingress.controller.requests.counter", cluster=${cluster_name} AND controller_pod="${controller}" AND controller_class="${controller_class}" AND namespace="${namespace}" AND status=/[4-5]../))), ingress)

sources.name: Total Rate
sources.query: sum(msum(2m, rate(ts("nginx.ingress.controller.requests.counter", cluster=${cluster_name} AND controller_pod="${controller}" AND controller_class="${controller_class}" AND namespace="${namespace}"))), ingress)

sources.name: Success Rate
sources.query: (${Error Rate}/${Total Rate})*100

sources.name: Received
sources.query: ts("nginx.ingress.controller.request.duration.seconds.bucket", cluster=${cluster_name} AND controller_pod="${controller}" AND controller_class="${controller_class}" AND namespace="${namespace}" AND ingress=${ingress} )

sources.name: Received
sources.query: sum(msum(2m, rate(ts("nginx.ingress.controller.request.size.sum", cluster=${cluster_name} AND controller_pod="${controller}" AND controller_class="${controller_class}" AND namespace="${namespace}" AND ingress=${ingress}))))

sources.name: Sent
sources.query: 0 - sum(msum(2m, rate(ts("nginx.ingress.controller.response.size.sum", cluster=${cluster_name} AND controller_pod="${controller}" AND controller_class="${controller_class}" AND namespace="${namespace}" AND ingress=${ingress}))))

sources.name: A
sources.query: ts("nginx.ingress.controller.nginx.process.resident.memory.bytes.gauge",  cluster=${cluster_name} AND controller_pod="${controller}" AND controller_class="${controller_class}" AND namespace="${namespace}")

sources.name: A
sources.query: mavg(2m, rate(ts("nginx.ingress.controller.nginx.process.cpu.seconds.total.counter",  cluster=${cluster_name} AND controller_pod="${controller}" AND controller_class="${controller_class}" AND namespace="${namespace}")))
